metadata.title: Wednesday, 14th February, 2024
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Foreign Affairs and International Co-operation
parts: (a) whether there were any officers recalled from diplomatic missions who were still on the payroll of the diplomatic missions where they served, as of August, 2023; and
(b) if so, why the officers in question had been maintained on the payroll despite their recall.
(a) what the prevalence rate for diabetes, countrywide, was, as of August, 2023;
(b) how many cases were reported annually from 2015 to 2022; and
(c) what measures are being taken to bring the disease under control. 183 Mr Chonde (Milenge) - to ask the Minister of Local Government and Rural Development:
(a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the Kapalala-Lungomukuta road in Milenge Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a museum in Kabwe Central Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines and Minerals Development
parts: (a) how the Black Mountain Consortium in Kitwe District was constituted;
(b) how many women and youths benefited from the 30% that the Government allocated to the Consortium from February, 2022 to February, 2023;
(c) whether the Government has any plans to increase the percentage allocation to co-operatives in order to ensure more people benefit from the project; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Green Economy and Environment
parts: (a) when the Government will rehabilitate the water reticulation system at the Zambia Forestry College in Kamfinsa Parliamentary Constituency; and
(b) what the estimated cost of the project is. 187. Mr Chinkuli (Kanyama) - to ask theMinister ofHealth:
(a) whether the Government has any plans to upgrade the Kanyama Level I Hospital in Kanyama Parliamentary Constituency, to a general hospital;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the Government will complete the construction of the following infrastructure in Sinda District:

(c) what the cost of each project is.
(a) what measures the Government is taking to promote the rearing of cattle in rural areas, countrywide; and
(b) what measures are being taken to control animal diseases in rural areas.
